title: Love Island Australia star Matthew Zukowski nearly exposes his manhood during breakfast surprise
text:
Male model and wrestler Matthew Zukowski had spent his first night with partner Vanessa Sierra after being coupled up on Love Island Australia's Monday debut.

And on Tuesday night's episode, he surprised his 'girlfriend' in bed with a naked surprise for her birthday.

The 24-year-old risked a wardrobe malfunction as she brought Vanessa breakfast in a barely-there apron that almost exposed his manhood.

'It wasn't a bad gift': Love Island Australia star Matthew Zukowski, 24, nearly exposed his manhood while surprising partner Vanessa Sierra with breakfast on Tuesday night's episode

Frying at the barbecue with co-star and 'nudist' Gerard Majda, the handsome Jack London model removed his black Calvin Klein underwear.

As Vanessa sat on their bed chatting with the other Islanders, she got surprised as he and Gerard casually strolled into the room singing happy birthday.

'Oh my god,' she said, as she was presented with the breakfast from the two naked men.

'Oh my god,' she said, as she was presented with the breakfast from the two men, with partner Matt (L) bending over to give the busty beauty Vanessa a kiss

Sealed with a kiss: Clearly overwhelmed by the racy gesture, she said: 'I was trying to look at him but my eyes were constantly looking down'

That was when Matthew bended over and allowed the flap of his flimsy apron to fall forward, almost exposing his manhood to the camera.

Clearly overwhelmed by the racy gesture, she said: 'I was trying to look at him but my eyes were constantly looking down.'

'It wasn't a bad birthday gift at all,' she cheekily added with a grin.

Elsewhere, the new couple got hot and heavy as they soaked up the sun together on one of the outside lounges in the villa.

Grub's up! Model Matt (L) was helped by self-confessed 'nudist' Gerard Majda - the handsome Jack London model removed his black Calvin Klein underwear at the barbecue

'Do you enjoy me getting you breakfast?' Matt asked, as Vanessa snuggled into him.

'Yeah, it was super cute,' Vanessa replied.

The new couple went on to lament how they don't know each other very well, adding they believe they are the show's strongest couple.

Love Island Australia continues on Channel Nine, Wednesday, 8.30pm.
description: The ladies of Love Island are normally the ones who suffer wardrobe malfunctions.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
